pages.text: $(br2)$(br2)This chapter will define the different classes in the Freeman section of the class tree.

pages.title: FREEMAN
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Pockets$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.primary_active) to active a 9 slot inventory space$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_classes#freeman_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: ARTISAN
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Crafting$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.primary_active) to active a crafting inventory gui$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_classes#freeman_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: EXCAVATOR
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Miner's Life$()$(br2)While breaking blocks you do not use saturation$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_classes#freeman_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: BARON
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Hero's Reminisce$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.primary_active) to activate a 5 minute Hero of the Village effect on a 40 minute cooldown. $(br2)$(l)$(n)Trade Secrets$()$(br2)You can trade infinitely with villagers$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_classes#freeman_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: BLACKSMITH
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Quality Equips$()$(br2)Crafting items increases base stats (armor=0.25 toughness; digging tools=10% break speed; melee weapons=1 health damage; ranged weapons=2 health damage)$(br2)$(l)$(n)Reforging Arts$()$(br2)You gain a PMMO Reforging level$(br2)$(br)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_classes#freeman_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: CULTIVATOR
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Farmer's Bounty$()$(br2)You gain a 30% increase in harvestable crops$(br2)$(l)$(n)Rancher's Bounty$()$(br2)You gain a 20% chance to breed two baby animals$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_classes#freeman_home)RETURN TO TOP

pages.title: PROSPECTOR
pages.text: $(l)$(n)Maniac Mining$()$(br2)Use key $(k:key.origins.primary_active) to apply 40 exhaust, but gain Haste 5 for 20 seconds on a 10 second cooldown$(br2)$(l)$(n)Earth Knowledge$()$(br2)You gain +1 raw ore when breaking copper, iron, gold, and diamond$(br)$(br)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_classes#freeman_home)RETURN TO TOP
